welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Foxborough, where the charm of our quaint town meets the excitement of our renowned sports culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our vibrant city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Logan International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. However, it may require a login and may have limited bandwidth.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport houses most of the airport's amenities, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and dining options.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at T. F. Green Airport serves as the international terminal, with gates for flights to Canada and Europe.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at T. F. Green Airport serves as the domestic terminal, with gates for flights within the United States.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Plymouth Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Plymouth Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal where all commercial flights operate from.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is for private and chartered flights only.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
